long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crossy Road, the beloved and addictive arcade game, is now available as a Chrome Extension! Prepare to embark on a pixelated adventure as you help a variety of charming characters cross busy roads, treacherous rivers, and other hazardous terrains.

In Crossy Road, your goal is simple: guide your character across an endless series of obstacles without getting hit or falling into the water. Tap to move forward, swipe to change directions, and time your movements carefully to avoid cars, trucks, trains, and other dangers.

The game's delightful pixel art style and catchy sound effects create a nostalgic and immersive experience. Unlock a wide range of quirky characters, from animals to robots, with each character offering its own unique animation and personality.

The Chrome Extension edition of Crossy Road brings this addictive and family-friendly game directly to your browser. Whether you're looking to pass the time or challenge your friends for high scores, Crossy Road is just a click away.

Test your reflexes and strategic thinking as you navigate through an ever-changing landscape of obstacles. Collect coins along the way to unlock new characters and discover hidden secrets. How far can you go before your luck runs out?

Install the Crossy Road - Chrome Extension now and join millions of players in this charming and challenging arcade adventure. It's time to hop, dodge, and cross your way to victory in Crossy Road!
